website_summaries.verdict: Whip up a batch of up to 3 lbs. of fries in 4 minutes with plenty of gas left in the propane tank for more deep frying.
pros: A dream machine for those who enjoy and/or serve fried cuisine on a regular basis
Per multiple reviews, this fryer fries a variety of foods consistently
Customers love that the fryer arrives with a drain valve and hose to dispel all used oil
cons: Few customers note that oil may leak from certain parts of the fryer, and if so this defect should be addressed with customer service

customer_reviews.title: ... a fabulous cooker-reaches temperature relatively fast -but the very best part is "IT HOLDS IT's TEMPERATURE no matter what ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a fabulous cooker-reaches temperature relatively fast -but the very best part is "IT HOLDS IT's TEMPERATURE no matter what I put in!! I cooked 5 lbs of FFries at once--only moved the needle just a little. It has an excellent way of adjusting the gas so you can pinpoint temp! The electric cookers I have never can keep up and therefore the food is oily and crappy--Not this unit--crispy and fast. I cooked a small turkey breast and chicken breasts and it did a great job! Customer service was great when I first received a thermometer that was 30F low--I had a replacement within 3 days "BUY THIS" you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 gallon fryer
customer_reviews.text: All stainless steel and built-in thermometer. I was skeptical with the deep fryer considering the price I paid for it, but it performed really well while using it all night at the festival we had. I was expecting that the burner would scorch the bottom of the fryer but it didn’t. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Once we got the oil to the green zone for temperature control it maintained the temperature producing beautifully light brown fish
customer_reviews.text: I used this Fryer to cook 15 lb of whole catfish and 10 lb of ocean perch form our annual family reunion. Once we got the oil to the green zone for temperature control it maintained the temperature producing beautifully light brown fish. No burnt ones or under cooked. It took approximately 45 minutes to cook all the fish above and guest were very pleased. Excellent product and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cpowel21

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: The Bayou Classic arrived last week and I put it together the same day. Assembly took about 90 minutes, but i’m sure others could do it in an hour or so. I like to be meticulous and organized. I didn’t use the fryer for about a week and just let it sit in the garage. Well today was the day that I let her rip and boy did it go! Beyond expectations! I cooked 10 catfish filets and two lbs of shrimp in about 15 minutes. The fish and shrimp came out golden brown with no blemishes. Anyone in the market for a deep fryer, this is the one! Highly recommend, with no reservations!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney T

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was quick and easy! We fried 28 pounds of catfish
customer_reviews.text: Received the fryer in two days as Amazon promised and in time to take on our annual family camping trip to the lake. Assembly was quick and easy! We fried 28 pounds of catfish, bass and bream, five pounds of french fries and hot water cornbread. The burner did not roar as I have been used to with other fryers and we had to wait for the oil to come back to temp between batches. Overall it is a good fryer and fed 24 people! I would like to know if the regulator can be tweaked to deliver a little stronger flow of gas for faster temp. Very easy to clean!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R WIGGINS

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the troops.
customer_reviews.text: Put this unit next to our BBQ on the back porch. Can't believe I haven't owned one of these 40 years ago. This baby heats up in minutes and can hold temp regardless of how fast you want keep putting in new food. 20 guests- 30 guests, bring them on, everyone eats at the same time. Super deep, no splashing mess. Along with my new blue rhino 33" outdoor flat top , I can cook burgers and fries for 30+ all at the same time. Don't know how we lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha vanderkallen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fryer, holds temperature like a boss
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome fryer. I got sick of struggling with my smaller electric fryer and getting limp soggy disgusting fries, etc out of it. This thing took about 15 minutes to warm up (in Minnesota during winter mind you), once it was warm I started frying. Wow, this thing held the temperature without any issue, had one basket of chicken, and one basket of frozen fries. About 3-4 minutes per basket and I was done. For anyone that entertains larger crowds or just simply loves frying this is definitely the fryer for you. Wish I had bought this years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karl O.

customer_reviews.title: marvelous !
customer_reviews.text: i just want to say. .THIS IS GREAT!!! light to carry, being as it is. heats up fast! as the heat goes right where you need it. thus it cook the food FAST!! bout 10 min for a basket of frys and a basket of chicken legs ( 6 ). only not so good thing is. the breading falls off and down to the bottom. but too much, and it clogs the drain vent. yeah! but i found a way around that. so we are very happy with this. thanks! oh oh and the guy in the service end. really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Norman. . . .. .

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FRYER NEEDS TO BE TALLER.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best fryers I have used so far. The only thing I think should be changed is the height of the unit. Its not tall enough to get a 5 gallon container under it to drain the oil. However I added a platform to extend the height of the unit. I also think it should have an adjustable damper on the exhaust to regulate the exhaust flow. Does a great job holding the temp, even with two baskets dropped at a time. Be sure to monitor the temperature because this can get hot fairly quick and there is no automatic thermostat. Overall its a very good fryer for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got it
customer_reviews.text: Got my bayou classic as scheduled.took bout 30 minutes to assemble.i had a family gathering in waldorf,MD,so I took it with me for the fish Fry..let me tell ya,this fryer is the best everybody wanted to know how much it cost and where bi got it from.i think I fried over 60 talapia fillets in a half hour.with over a hundred folks at the gathering,the fish were hot and plentiful..I would recommend this fryer to all.only flaw is that it doesn't have thermostat to regulate the heat.u gotta watch the temp..but it all good..best fryer by far..going to buy two more for my catering business
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Knight

customer_reviews.title: Best fryer ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have done in decades. I cook in a farmers’ market and food festivals and this fryer is amazing. Very easy to control temperature, the thermometer works perfectly and very easy to clean. I strongly recommend it. The V base is perfect for keeping all the fried waste in the bottom not affecting what you are frying above. Baskets are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stlouis User

customer_reviews.title: Read the negative reviews before you purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Read the negative reviews before you purchase this. They are the accurate description that likes to get hidden. Wish I had done that before I bought one. On mine the temp gauge does not work. The instructions in the gauge box tells you to test it first in boiling water. If not accurate to call this number, which does not exist. Actually there is not a phone number anywhere that I can find the works for this company. If I would have tested the temp gauge before I built the fryer, I would have sent it back. I have not used mine yet. Not sure how I'm going to monitor the temperature effectively
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little fryer. We use it for fundraising. The only complaint I have is that it did start to warp at the back where the flame comes through. We did keep the flame low and the heat maintained. It does take a little while for the oil to cool. If you need to drain for transport, I'd recommend metal buckets with tight lids. Otherwise, it just takes time to cool off. Overall, it has worked out very well for us and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bruha

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly! Heat Ups Fast!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so easy to assemble and heat very fast. The best part is that it maintains temperature very well. We fried 1 case of fish and maybe 15lbs of shrimp in less than an hour. And the drain pipe is all that. Just make sure to shake off your fish, shrimp or any fried foods so that the excess won't go to the bottom and clog the drain pipe. And I'd recommend using a thicker oil (peanut for example) if you are frying a lot of food. It includes 2 nice sized basket so you have you'll need for a good fry outing.
customer_reviews.author: Scroggs

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is a faulty product it almost blew up my restaurant and took my life DO NOT BUY FROM THEM WAIT FOR LOWES OR HOME DEPOT I WISH I DID EXTREMELY DANGEROUS BURNS ALL ITEMS AS WELL THEY HAVE REFUSED TO REFUND ME MY STAFF WAS PUT ASK RISK!!!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY AMAZON TOOK MY MONEY AND THEY DONT CARE ABOUT MY SAFETY OUR THE SAFETY OF MY GUEST
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Love this fryer
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is awesome! I've used it 3 times with rock fish, chicken strips and Hood Canal shrimp. 3/4 turn on the fuel valve got the temp to 360 in 15 minutes. This fryer is very loud, kinda sounds like a jet taking off but that's ok with me because I don't deep fry in the house anyway. It has no thermostat but that's no problem. Once it reaches temperature turn it way down to whisper quiet and it holds temperature nicely. I'm excited about cooking with this fryer for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Dieter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome. Holds temp perfectly after putting food down in ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. Holds temp perfectly after putting food down in the oil. Once the fryer is to temp, you can significantly lower the burner and it still keeps temp just fine. It is loud when you are warming up the oil (jet sound) like others have described but it's farily quiet once you lower the burner down after you get the oil to temp. Highly recommend this if you need to fry a lot of food.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Finley

customer_reviews.title: The Cajun is a great fryer - just a crazy steady performer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bomb. I have owned this one now and the Cajun Fryer. The Cajun is a great fryer - just a crazy steady performer, but heavy as hell and the paint on the unit turns to paste - try to paint it again with high temp paint, and it's just more grease... Heavy cooker, did I mention that? This thing is light - "hot" - comes up to heat quickly - and a handsome performer. Plan to work quick. Nice addition to my cooking tools. A very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jeffrey S Forrester

customer_reviews.title: top marks
customer_reviews.text: would trade this for anything, I have an outdoor kitchen and this was the perfect upgrade to it, not easy to clean though. I can heat it up in 20 minutes, cook 10 pounds of chicken wings in 17 - 20 minutes. I like them crispy before I soak them in sauce. They are probably done in about 15. Stainless steel is the way to go here. Baskets are very good quality. holds 4.5 gallons to fill line. Love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Timests24

customer_reviews.title: It's a Mean, Lean Frying Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is AMAZING! It made quick & easy work of fried fish, shrimp, hush puppies & French fries for 20 people. It took about 15-20 minutes for the oil to come up to temp, but once there it held solid throughout the cook. The crumbs & sediment all settle into the bottom of the fryer's v-shaped design below the level of the heating element. This means tasty fried food without scorched bits spoiling the flavor of the peanut oil. Clean-up was super-easy with the drain valve. Once cleaned with soap & water, it looks brand new again. I'm looking forward to many, many more fish fry's and the chance to use my new favorite fryer ... Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R.

customer_reviews.title: Party Wing Central
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!!! I was able to deep fry 10lbs of Potatoes and 30lbs of Chicken wings for a baby shower we were having. All the kids loved the fries and the lemon pepper chicken wings I was able to make with this...
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful additon to our Home
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. We fry fish all the time and needed something better than the conventional fish fryer. The definitly fits that bill. Easy to use. Easy to clean up and store. always ready to use. Perfect Christmas present for the Husband.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Fryer
customer_reviews.text: There is not much more to say about this other than it is great and I should have gotten the 3 basket larger one. I got the wheeled stand with it, which makes it so much easier, be smart spend the extra money, you will thank me later. We have a lot of summer parties and this comes in very handy, and being from Buffalo, I can make some excellent wings for everyone to enjoy, and boy do they. From regular dinner to our summer and Super Bowl parties, this thing gets a work out and works great every time. Easy to clean, easy to change the oil, can't beat it. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: slow to heat and keep up temp
customer_reviews.text: Cooked fish for 65 people but the temp would not stay up after a few fillets I had to stop and let the temp try??? to get back up to 350 and that was the best I was able to get it up to the temp was around 70 and we were in the door way of a large shed, so the wind did't have any thing to do with it. I hope I can get some larger jets for it?? thank goodness I had my old Cabela's single burner fryer to keep up with the demand.
customer_reviews.author: myronh

customer_reviews.title: Great fish fryer
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy can fry a lot of fish in a short amount of time. We have only used it once, but fried fish for over 60 people with very little effort. The grease stays good with the bits and pieces falling to the bottom away from the new batch. It worked so well, that we friend the potatoes in it, too. I sure was hoping this would be used more, but oh well. When we have another fish fry, it will be used!
customer_reviews.author: Oma (aka Gramma)

customer_reviews.title: Read tons of reviews prior to this purchase. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Read tons of reviews prior to this purchase. Had an oyster and fish fry on our first use. Fried 15 pounds of fish, bushel of oysters and 40 lbs of French fries and the cooker never missed a beat. Temperature was maintained very well, even after the frying was done, I left the flame turned down low and 15 minutes later it was still holding 350 degrees. This fryer is the bomb, got lots of compliments and a couple wanted to rent it for the football games the next day. Can't wait till next time. Amazon's service was top notch too, received in 2 days, no fuss no muss.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fryer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer, worth the price. I bought as a backup for my commercial fryer that I use in my concession stand. This fryer outperforms my much more expensive commercial fryer. I can cook frozen foods all day long and I never have to wait for the temperature to catch up in order to reach temperature. My only issues with these fryers are that they make a loud roaring sound, not thermostatically controlled, and must be used outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I used this fryer for a solid hours frying fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this fryer for a solid hours frying fresh cut fries that had been stored overnight in cold water. It kept up all day with hardly any recovery time needed while using very little propane. I will be buying another one in the very near future.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Crook

customer_reviews.title: The welds that attach the leg supports to the fryer seem of poor quality at best
customer_reviews.text: The fryer came in damaged. I returned it and requested a refund. The welds that attach the leg supports to the fryer seem of poor quality at best, this is probably why the rear leg supports in addition to being damaged were off the fryer's "body". I had read about other customers having problems with bad welds on the fryer and legs etc....now I see what they were talking about. It would be dangerous with the weight of four gallons of hot oil, if one of the legs decided to come off. The manufacturer needs to get his welding together!
customer_reviews.author: Roger D.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could it would be a "ZERO". This item was shipped fast, no damage to the box but there was damage to the unit itself not allowing the legs to be installed. The holes for the legs would not line up. Seemed like it was cheaply put together and was very dirty on the inside, where the oil would be. This item went straight back. Very poor quality controls.
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Welds of the heating tube to the oil reservoir look awful (but doesn't leak). Weld cleanliness is poor (in contact with the oil - so you're going to ingest this stuff). Be nice if the oil reservoir was double walled - save a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fryer. We had been looking at more expensive ones, but had decided against buying one, right now, due to the cost. Then I saw this fryer and the good reviews on Amazon, and we decided to get it. Great decision. My hubby is a gas technician and is impressed with the speed in which the oil heats up, the easy draining and clean up and the over all sturdy materials and manufacturing of this fryer.
customer_reviews.author: llisamac

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent paid !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cooker is fantastic. We got it to do family catfish fries and it worked like a champ. Never lost heat, cooked perfectly and even though breaded fish cooked... Oil looks fantastic.. so glad we got this well worth the price !!! I did go back and ordered the cart so it's easier to get in and out of garage... But well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Little

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Thai crispy whole fish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This is my first fryer and I love it. Easy to use and well built for the price range. I used this fryer to make Thai crispy whole fish (flounder and red snapper) and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Some componenets not assembled/machined well.  Does fry very well
customer_reviews.text: Lid came loose first use. Got new screw same size as one remaining in it and it fell out as well. Holes were not machined the same, so bigger hole keeps loosing screw. Handle on one of the baskets broke during initial use, The welds broke where the handle is welded/soldered to the basket. It is loud when running, but does fry well. Will be looking into warranty information for replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No fluctuation in temperature.
customer_reviews.text: No Words to describe how Happy I am with the Bayou Classic. This Bayou cooked chicken wings, chicken breasts, fish, mushrooms, mozzarella sticks, French fries, cat heads, turkey nuts, etc., etc., etc... to perfection. It did not fluctuate in its temperature, and did the job in half the time as the big fireman fryers. Best product I have ever seen. It took the same time to cook each food, but the time was saved in it holding the perfect temperature.
customer_reviews.author: terry stutler

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for husband for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with the accompanying cart. Only complaint is that instructions for assembly of both items are poor. We cooked 4# catfish fillets, 4# shrimp, large bag of fries, and bag of frozen hushpuppies in the time that my previous large electric fry daddy would have managed to warm oil and fry the hushpuppies.
customer_reviews.author: Imthemom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: If I could put 10 starts I would ! This fryer makes me excited about cooking. It cooks food fast and taste great. And Yes it does take 4 GALLONS of oil . I also recommend getting the roll stand to come with it , makes it easier to move .
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing! Fries food perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Holds temporarily well. Heats up quickly. Fries foods perfectly. I love this thing! Only complaint is it’s pretty loud. especially since I am using it at a campground. But several people have them. It’s a little hard to clean. And drain valve has a slight leak. U will want a cover or bug will get it the oil over night. I always drain mine after each use, and put oil back in container. But a little word of wisdom, it take almost 6 hrs for oil to cool down. Uses 4 gallons of oils.
customer_reviews.author: Bear270

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!! I would have given it 5 stars if the temperature regulation would have been easy to control. There was only a slight breeze every once in a while and it really affected the temp. Other than that it worked perfectly! I used it to make Malasadas (Portuguese Doughnuts) for Fat Tuesday and it cut our cooking time in half. The doughnuts came out perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cooks like no tomorrow, non stop french fries for hours, highly recommend, one issue is the hose attachment point on burner gets too hot and melts hose this should be recalled or a fix in place, possibly can ignite if hose was to blow open while using. I fixed mine with extended piece of copper tube and some fittings to turn down on a 90 so hose is facing down now it never gets hot at all, this is not a manufactures approved repair
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Krasnodemski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this a couple of times for our pool / football watch parties. Works great and as intended. It's loud because of the propane burner but gets the job done very well. Would recommend to anyone needing to deep fry anything for an outdoor party.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel is always a great product. They are easy to clean and take ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered exactly what we wanted, but when we received it there was oil in it and it also had 2 bent parts on it. Was going to return product, but husband said he would deal with it. Other than that we are ready to cook with it. Stainless steel is always a great product. They are easy to clean and take care of compared to others. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Morganblue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fryer. When I saw it advertised @ 46% off on Amazon I couldn't pass it up. Fried 20lbs of catfish and 16lbs of fries in 45 minutes. Unit holds heat @ 350 very well. I would also recommend the single basket for frying chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I got this fryer for my husband and it works great. The first time he used it he made 15 pounds of French fries. We also make dough boys, which is fried yeast dough using the fryer. He was able to cook four at a time. He just loves the fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryjmo

customer_reviews.title: Quality fryer
customer_reviews.text: Cooked with this for the 1st time this weekend - very impressed! This is a high quality product. Cooked a case of chicken wings and other stuff. Cooked evenly and quickly. Oil still in good condition. This performs even better than I imagined. Buy this and you will be happy. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: this is got to be the awesomest fryer for backyard fries I did it fundraiser yesterday and cook 40 lb of homemade french fries I would recommend this to anybody who loves to fry food great investment
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Fryer Leaks Oil
customer_reviews.text: Fryer leaks oil because of bad welds on the inside of the unit. I read a couple other reviews stating the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: ajg006

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: love the cooker---hold ur temp great--I fry everything in the same grease---fish--deer--turkey--etc...has saved a ton of $$$$ on grease--one does not have to change or throw the gease away all the time
customer_reviews.author: DON CARY BOUNDS

customer_reviews.title: leaks around welds on heat intake after few months
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one ive bought and im aggravated that the welds on this one are leaking 6 month of use...like the last one....gave benefit of the doubt on 1st one. now i m looking for a solution
customer_reviews.author: james e williams jr

customer_reviews.title: Cajun Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use. It takes about 20 minutes to heat the 4 gallons of oil but the Bayou Classic does the job. Perfect for a fish fry with a dozen friends.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Tex

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a friend. They love it. It's used for frying fish and wings and fries. They say it works like a professional unit and keeps it's temperature which makes everything better and crispy. They are very happy with it and would definitely buy it again. It's very heavyweight.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a man who loves to cook
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my husband. He had actually used one for a church function and couldn't wait for it to arrive. He's already used it several times and loves it. Great gift for a man who loves to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Foster

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Overall the fryer is nice with the exception of the bent frame. The box was not damaged on the outside, therefore it is my belief that the product was damaged prior to placement in the box. Initially, I was going to return the product, but I decided to straighten the bent portion so that I could insert the legs. Since my original post, I ordered two additional fryers. They both arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Options are expensive and thermometer is faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Problem is you have to spend another $110 to make it mobile. I think it should be mobile when you buy it. The thermometer fogged up after just two uses. This is an instrument that is critical to preventing a fire!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Fiance on Fathers Day and he absolutely LOVES it! All of his friends are jealous of it! Heats up fast and stays at a consistent temp pretty easy! Makes THE BEST Onion Rings and Jalapeno Poppers!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bayou Classic invented the prefect cookers with the Cajun Cooker line of products. Burning of oil is eliminated with the burner location and cooking oil last months instead of days , because it doesn't burn the droppings in the grease. I own 2 Cajun Cookers and now a Bayou Classic the best fryers on the market!
customer_reviews.author: pearce369

customer_reviews.title: Real Work Horse
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. We fried fish and shrimp for 150 people with 2 of these for Labor Day. Easy to set up and easy to empty the grease. Keeps the temperature on point without all kinds of adjustments while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G.

customer_reviews.title: I had one of these and used it at my ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and used it at my church for fish frys. My church had me order a second one. With two running we can cook 45#s of catfish filets, one case of hush puppies an hour. That was information I couldn find on the product. You can't scorch the oil and is simple to use. Once you get the out temp regulated you can just go. I also added the large baskets to rotate out. That way you have fish ready to go in when u take the done fish out.
customer_reviews.author: Crams77

customer_reviews.title: No fuss fryer
customer_reviews.text: I used this fryer this past weekend and it performed great. I fried 120 pieces of fish easily and I wasn’t working hard. The temperature was easy to maintain and my oil stayed clean. When I was done I drained the oil back into the container. This is a must have fryer if you’re into outdoor frying. Everyone was commenting on how nice this fryer cooked.
customer_reviews.author: yolanda washington

customer_reviews.title: Recycled Junk
customer_reviews.text: It pains me to give this product one star. As I was putting it together, I noticed my hands were getting slippery... they also started to smell like peanut oil.... which tells me I was sent a used fryer.... all of the components were brand new, but I know the main part had oil in it at some point. For 250 bucks, this is by far the worst product I have ever purchased. EVER. Stick to the simple pot and burner method .... it’s cheaper, and more durable than this piece of Junk
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the temp!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it holds the temperature. There is no adjusting once you have the temp just right. When you add food to it, it doesn't drop the temp at all. I will be ordering a big basket. I like the option of two baskets that it comes with, but if I'm cooking one kind of item, I want to be able to drop it in one. I will also be ordering the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed our expectations
customer_reviews.text: Our guests were totally impressed with the quality of this amazing fryer. It is easy to drain and clean. We purchased the rolling cart with side table for the fryer to stand in which made for an easy storage. It is a serious fryer and not meant to be started up around children or pets. Being that it is stainless steel we plan to have it for many many years to enjoy our fish frying and fried green tomatoes too...yummy,
customer_reviews.author: Deb-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooker. However, the temperature is a little difficult to control. Cleaning is also a hassle. It has a drain valve, but you will need to modify it to get the oil back into the original container.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Reed

customer_reviews.title: THIS DEEP FRYER ''ROCKS'' AND AMAZON ROCKS.
customer_reviews.text: I RECENTLY PURCHASED THIS FRYER FROM AMAZON. THE PRICE IS ''GREAT'' IN FACT I HAVE NOT FOUND A FRYER OF THIS QUALITY ANY CHEAPER ANYWHERE. SPEAKING OF QUALITY...IT IS GREAT. I LOVE THIS DEEP FRYER. I FRY A LOT OF FISH AND OWN A ''FRYMASTER'' COMMERICAL5 GALLON DEEP FRYER. THIS FRYER WILL DO EVERYTHING THAT MY COMMERICAL FRYER WILL DO AND IT DIDN'T COST $2,000. I WOULD HIGHLY RECCOMMEND THIS DEEP FRYER TO ANYONE WHO IS SERIOUS ABOUT FRYING GOOD FOOD !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Deep Fried Chicken
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because I absolutely have no complaints. I've cooked chicken, Fish and french fries for all my Family events & it was perfect! I only recommend buying the matching stand with the wheels because it makes it easier to transport the fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe they actually sent this amazing fryer to Hawaii via Prime. What a score for our family. Two thumbs up! This is a frying beast.
customer_reviews.author: Shar (Choo) Iseri

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot reviews and am very excited about this fryer. I use a backup thermometer too double check temperature. It’s been running about 5 degrees cooler. No problem this is a easy cure. This fryer is the one to buy. The inside construction is great! No problems anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: john erickson jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer for Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fryer for its size and ease of use. It's narrow but easy to move around when empty and extremely portable. Having a built in thermometer as it does is good; it would be even better with a safety shut-off but the regulator valve is sensitive and allows adjustment of the flame/heat levels. The unit vents through a separate vent on the back. The stainless steel is superior to other small models made of aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Popster

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product received
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed due to damaged lid! Packaging looked perfect but lid was damaged. Should’ve supported our local businesses instead of ordering due to this reason!
customer_reviews.author: Diva's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Great! Fryer! This thing holds temp like nothing else I’ve used before. It heats up quickly and is easy to adjust for temperature control. My first fry was fish and chips and as fast as I could feed the fryer it would cook it with ease. Great product Bayou Classic!
customer_reviews.author: bigdamswamp

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've eaten over 100 chicken wings in the past 3 days. Heats up fast, easy to clean. Awesome design!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fries food quickly. It eliminates the smell of fried food sinside your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Terwin

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, all stainless, including hardware. Will never rust.
customer_reviews.text: Fryer does an excellent job, maintains temperature. It will cut your frying time to less than half, over a pot style fryer. The design prevents the oil from becoming dark from burnt residue. Has high quality baskets, with removable handles. All stainless, will never rust out. It will make you look like pro at 🐟 fries!!
customer_reviews.author: Lt Dan

customer_reviews.title: IT’S USED.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the fryer yet. Just opened it and took it out of the box. The fryer has clearly been used before. It smells like cooking oil and you can see where the oil was in it. I paid FULL price for a used unit. This was amazon’s choice. It was for my dad for Father’s Day and I gave him a used gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Washington

customer_reviews.title: Love this fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer for frying fish and fries! the debris goes to the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases on Amazon. Easy to assemble. Fried 120lbs Of whiting for a party. No problem at all. A must purchase for events.
customer_reviews.author: Prime-A-Dona

customer_reviews.title: Work fine for the price I cook 250 chicken wings on ...
customer_reviews.text: Work fine for the price I cook 250 chicken wings on two hours. Only one thing was not right. I have to wait for one more week because the missing that nuts tools I can put Together until two weeks later. I calling For the missing parts and the mail to me Week after. J. C From Grand Rapids, Mi (4 Star)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremias Cifuentes

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but sounds like a jet engine when running.
customer_reviews.author: Frankkop

customer_reviews.title: Lot of Potential, Poor Craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a little disappointed in the overall quality. As others have commented, the welds are pretty dodgy. I've attached a video so you can have a look before buying. Hope it helps. I'd probably still buy it, but just with lower expectations. By the way, I can't review the actual cook quality (I'm sure it's fine... after all it's just a tub of hot oil), until I fill it with hot water and detergent and spend some time scrubbing it out.
customer_reviews.author: GRG

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for the perfect fryer. This is it! We have enjoyed cooking outdoors with this product.
customer_reviews.author: foothillstree

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fryer, maintains temperature
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fryer, maintains temperature, easy to assemble, use and easy to clean. Commercial and restaurant grade for outdoors. Just a great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY C WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. I use it every chance i get and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon parnel

customer_reviews.title: Seems cheaply built definitely not the quality I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not that great but ok for the price I haven’t used it yet and will update when I do
customer_reviews.author: George Koval

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Have used it for two different family fish ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have used it for two different family fish fries so far. Have made fish, fries, and hush puppies for 50 each time in under 45 minutes and still have over half bottle of propane remaining. Wish the drain hose was a little shorter. Need to set fryer on a platform in order to drain it.
customer_reviews.author: MaksDad

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It does oil splash when first putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It does oil splash when first putting in French fries. Stand away. BUT I LOVE IT. We have used it three times and out of the three times twice it has (tank maybe) frozen up. Then we wait and move the Regulator then it works. We have used three different Prophane Bottles. Is it the Regulator? Should I request a new Regulator?
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Cooker is just great!!
customer_reviews.text: I cooked halibut, turned out great, what's not to like!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great for fish frys
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprised how well this unit maintains temp. Cooks very even and uses very little fuel. Great for fish frys!
customer_reviews.author: Exiled

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST FRYER I HAVE EVER OWNED. I PLAN ON BUYING ANOTHER FOR THE LAKE HOUSE!
customer_reviews.author: roy hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love it except cant keep heat in green
customer_reviews.text: Love it except cant keep heat in green. I have dropped fries and fish and both times the temp drops below green and never comes back up while cooking. This is with the reg turned all the way up. If I am doing something wrong please advise. Using peanut oil.
customer_reviews.author: TennAV

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer: Robust Craftsmanship for the money Pro's 1. Deep Valley design reduces chances of seasonings/battery burning. 2. Easy assembly instructions 3. Holds temp well 4. Easy drain and clean. Con's 1. If you are thinking the baskets are commercial size...think again. They are well crafted, but remarkably am smaller. 2. Price movement: This product price fluctuated between +$15-18 dollars within a two week period of me adding to my wish list and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Golston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Husband LOVES this fryer. Bought for his birthday and he’s had so much fun frying different things. I love that I don’t have to cook and the house isn’t being heated up (Florida life)! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brock

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I have a eggroll side business and I make about 900 eggrolls per weekend. All the eggrolls comes out perfectly cooked. Easy to cook with, sample, and a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: We used the fryer this weekend and it worked great. We fried fish
customer_reviews.text: We used the fryer this weekend and it worked great. We fried fish, fries and hush puppies. Would recommend checking prices at several different stores. Our local home supply store has it for $72.00 less than I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Chop

customer_reviews.title: Cooks like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Best outdoor cooking equipment ever. I do a lot of outdoor fire cooking and this really compliments what I can cook. Kids love to have tried dough and funnel cakes. I love fried soft shell crabs. Cooks perfect
customer_reviews.author: Keith e

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a more manageable size than some other cookers.
customer_reviews.text: The cooker is large enough to cook for a crowd, but small enough to be more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenhawk

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is pretty awesome took a little while to get used to how to control the heat but now this very awesome I can cook a lot of food in a little bit of time and the grease last almost too long .
customer_reviews.author: Scottie Nettles

customer_reviews.title: it is a gift
customer_reviews.text: Very nice surprise for my birthday. Have used several time for fish and vegetables. Came out perfectly. makes great hushpuppies too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Works great. The 4 gallons of oil holds heat well, which makes cooking more uniform. If you like to fry, then you won't be sorry. Note: To fill it to the "fill" line, you will need more like 4-1/2 gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer. Have used several times and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy46

product_meta.title: Bayou Classic 700-701 4-Gallon Bayou Fryer Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: This 4-gallon Bayou Fryer is the ultimate in outdoor cooking. Perfect for backyard parties with family and friends. Fry fish, chicken, hushpuppies, and fries. The unique V-bottom design keeps base oil temperature cooler than frying temperature so the batter does not burn and your cooking oil stays clean and lasts longer.Includes a preset high pressure regulator assembly with stainless-steel braided hose.
feature_bullets: Bayou Classic 4-gallon fryer is one of the most efficient deep fryers on the market today
Include 2 stainless steel fry baskets, temperature gauge, drain valve, extension legs, and 10-PSI regulator kit with stainless-steel braided hose
Features a V-bottom design that keeps the base oil temperature cooler than the top frying temperature so batter does not burn and oil stays cleaner
The heat from the propane flows through the rear tube of the fryer, rolling the oil as it travels through
Measures 38-1/2 by 14-1/2 by 11-1/2 inches with stand
Features a V-bottom design that keeps the base oil temperature cooler than the top frying temperature so batter does not burn and oil stays cleaner
The heat from the propane flows through the rear tube of the fryer, rolling the oil as it travels through
Measures 38-1/2 by 14-1/2 by 11-1/2 inches with stand
